p: Re: [nihontostudy] continuing Habaki


I have two such habaki, one old a=
nd one by Miyajima sensei's father to 
match the old one. The "scratches ar=
e in the shape of peonies, thus 
botan. Ganseki means rocks or crags, I wou=
ld think crags.

Gordon
